Can only be learned by characters knowing @UUID[Compendium.forien-armoury.forien-armoury.Item.dV7lAlVYKiHcCXBT]{Fighting Style (Ironshield)}.

  • During riposte you may choose one of the following additional effects:

    • Cause 1 @Condition[Bleeding] Condition,

    • Perform @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.items.Item.jt0DmVK9IiF6Sd2h]{Strike to Stun} with your shield, as if you had the Talent,

    • Give â€“10 modifier to defend against the riposte.
